    Flamingo Hotel by the beach, Penang Vacancies SENIOR HOUSEKEEPING SUPERVISOR, HOUSEKEEPING SUPERVISOR

    October 19, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Flamingo Hotel by the beach, Penang is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for SENIOR HOUSEKEEPING SUPERVISOR, HOUSEKEEPING SUPERVISOR position. If you currently looking for new hotel job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    REQUIREMENTS:
    • Candidate must possess at least Higher Secondary/STPM/"A" Level/Pre-U in Hospitality/Tourism/Hotel Management or equivalent.
    • Required language(s): English, Bahasa Malaysia
    • Must have good leadership skills and able to lead all cleaners
    • At least 2 years of working experience as room attendant is required for this position.
    • Able to work on shifts,weekends and public holidays
    JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
    • To supervise and maintain a consistant standard of cleanliness, good conditions of rooms through daily checks.
    • To allot and ensure equal distribution of room attendants' assignment.
    • To monitor housekeeping staff misconduct issue by verbal or written work orders.
    • To follow-up on all defects with Engineering Department and assign rooms/block or areas to the Housekeeping associates for assignments.
    • To check and update room status to Front Office and compiles daily room status report.
    • To issue and be counted for all key cards.
    • To arrange and record RAB (roll-away beds) and baby cots upon request.  

    Company Overview

    Flamingo Hotel by the beach, Penang is been owned by Magnum Leisure Sdn. Bhd. on October 2009 and its last name is Crown Jewel Hotel and Crown Prince Hotel. There are 280 rooms in this hotel with facilities & activities such as the Flamingo Theque, Swimming Pool with Jacuzzi, Kid's corner, Games Room, Tour Desk, Business Centre, Ballroom and Function Rooms, Coffee House, Jewellery Shop, Drugstore, Lounge and Qin Spa, as well as direct access to an array of beach sports such as parasailing, banana boats and canoeing.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hotel job in Penang.
